    "number": 191134,
    "data": "1,3,4,10,11,13,15,31,34,39,40,43,46,51,59,94,103,118,121,123,130,135,139,154,155,159,171,178,183,203,235,283,310,355,364,370,375,391,406,411,418,463,466,471,478,483,491,514,519,535,539,550,555,610,615,619,635,683,706,711,731,811,850,931,939,1066,1093,1111,1126",
    "name": "Increasing sequence generated by these rules:  a(1)=1, and if x is in a then 3x+1 and 4x-1 are in a.",
    "comment": [
        "See A101113/"
    ],
    "link": [
        "Reinhard Zumkeller, <a href=\"/A191134/b191134.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000</a>"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "h = 3; i = 1; j = 4; k = -1; f = 1; g = 9;",
        "a = Union[Flatten[NestList[{h # + i, j # + k} &, f, g]]]   (* A191134 *)",
        "b = (a - 1)/3; c = (a + 1)/4; r = Range[1, 1500];",
        "d = Intersection[b, r] (* A191192 *)",
        "e = Intersection[c, r] (* A191193 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Haskell)",
        "import Data.Set (singleton, deleteFindMin, insert)",
        "a191134 n = a191134_list !! (n-1)",
        "a191134_list = f $ singleton 1",
        "   where f s = m : (f $ insert (3*m+1) $ insert (4*m-1) s')",
        "             where (m, s') = deleteFindMin s",
        "-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 01 2011"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A191113."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "1,2",
    "author": "_Clark Kimberling_, May 28 2011",
    "references": 4,
    "revision": 8,
    "time": "2013-07-13T12:04:10-04:00",
    "created": "2011-05-28T15:16:17-04:00"
